snippet: The donation assists a planned $300 million museum project, which will house the David Geffen Theater.
abstract: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences plans to name large movie space after David Geffen after receiving $25 million gift from David Geffen Foundation toward its $300 million museum project.
lead_paragraph: The donation assists a planned $300 million museum project, which will house the David Geffen Theater.

headline.main: Geffen Donates $25 Million to Film Museum Project
headline.print_headline: Geffen Gives $25 Million For New Movie Theater

keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
keywords.name: organizations
